K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303a-1: a'arya s'a ga ra n'a ga r'a dza pa ri pritstsha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303a-3: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303a-7: bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos gnas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa mngon par shes pa rab tu mang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303a-19: lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dus par @303b mkhyen nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-2: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-3: las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bskyod nas sems kyi dmigs pa sna tshogs kyis las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-4: de yis 'gro ba'ang sna tshogs su gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-7: rgya mtsho chen po 'di na gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-8: gzugs tha mal pa ji snyed snang ba la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-14: yid kyi las dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-15: mi dge ba sna tshogs su byas pas sna tshogs su gyur pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-22: bcos ma sgrub pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-27: las ji ltar bsags pas bsgrubs pa sna tshogs su byas pa dag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-28: 'di la byed pa bo gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-30: 'di ltar chos 'di dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-31: bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:303b-33: de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas chos thams cad sgrub pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-0: de dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du @304a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-1: byed na; sgrub pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams kyi phung po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-3: skye mched gang dag mngon par 'grub pa de dag mdzes shing blta na sdug la gzugs bzang ba dag tu mngon par 'grub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong las skyes pa mtshan rnams kyis ji ltar brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-7: dpal gyis lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas ma chags par bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-8: gang na brgya stong phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba'i tshangs pa chen po 'di dag mog mog por gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la blta na'ang mig zi zi bar gyur pa la ltos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi gzugs dang; mtshan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-15: dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pas brgyan pa bsgrubs pa'o; ;klu'i bdag po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304a-16: khyod kyi bkod pa 'di dang bsod nams thams cad las byung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-0: mi ma yin pa 'di dag gi bkod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad @304b kyang bsod nams las byung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-2: rgya mtsho chen po 'di na gang dag lus sna tshogs gzugs mi sdug cing dbyibs ma legs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-4: lus rags zhing che ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-5: gang dag lus phra zhing chud pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-8: yid kyi las dge ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-9: mi dge bas sna tshogs su gyur pa dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-13: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-15: las kyi rnam par smin pa la brten par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-17: khyed kyis de ltar slobs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-19: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-20: las kyi rnam par smin pa la brten pa khyed dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-21: lta ba chud gson par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-22: chad pa dang rtag par lta ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-23: khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mgu bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-24: mgu bar byas nas kyang bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-25: bsti stang byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-27: chos gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi ngan 'gro ngan song mi khom pa'i lam thams cad yang dag par gcod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:304b-28: chos gcig po gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-0: bdag ji ltar gyur cing nyin zhag rnams 'gro zhig gu snyam du dge ba'i chos rnams @305a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-2: de de ltar dge ba'i chos la rab tu rtog pa med pas mi dge ba'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-3: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi go skabs mi 'byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-4: de mi dge ba'i chos spangs te dge ba'i chos dang ldan pas bsam pa dag pa'i sems can 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-8: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-10: de la dge ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-11: dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-13: mi'i phun sum tshogs pa'i rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-22: gang 'di dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-23: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-25: srog gcod pa spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-26: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-27: 'dod pa la log par g-yen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-34: log par lta ba spong ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-36: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305a-38: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-0: klu'i bdag @305b po; ;de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-1: rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-4: 'dis sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin pa yin no; ;de sems can thams cad la byams par dmigs pa la gnas pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-5: de'i zhe sdang gi bag chags yang dag par chad pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-6: des nad nyung bar 'gyur bar sgrub pa yongs su bzung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-7: des tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i sa bon btab pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-8: de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyang srung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-11: bde bar nyal zhing bde bar sang pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-12: sdig pa'i rmi lam mi mthong ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-13: de nyal ba na'ang lha rnams sgrub par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-14: de la shar gnyer pa med pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-15: shar gnyer ba'i bag la nyal med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-16: ngan 'gro thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-17: shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-19: srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni; rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-20: srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-21: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub thob pa na sems kyi dbang gis tshe tshad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:305b-23: ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-0: yid brtan pa'i chos bcu thob @306a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-3: longs spyod che zhing de'i longs spyod de nas rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-8: nye mtshams kyis mi 'phrog pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-9: skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bas skye bo mang po dga' ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-10: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-11: nor 'brel pa rnams la yid brtan du rung ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-13: phyogs mtshams rnams su de'i bsngags pa brjod cing de la pha rol gyi gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-14: de'i dge ba brjod pa'i sgra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-15: tshigs su bcad pa mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-16: bag tsha ba med par 'khor gyi nang du 'jug ste zhum zhum po med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-23: phyug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-24: de'i sems sbyin pa yang dag par 'god pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-25: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-27: de ltar ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-28: yid brtan pa'i chos bcu po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306a-29: ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-0: de dge ba'i rtsa @306b des de bzhin gshegs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i ye shes can du rang gi mngon par shes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-2: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-3: mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-5: 'di lta ste; dbang po sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-6: rgod pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-7: 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsngags pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-10: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-11: mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-12: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-13: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mdo mas kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-15: brtsun du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-17: mis pa sngags pa'i chos brgyad thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-20: autpal la'i dri 'byung bas kha yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-21: 'jig rten thams cad kyi tshad mar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-23: mi dgang bas dbang gcig por 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:306b-24: dbugs 'byin pas 'byung po rnams dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-1: pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-3: sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-4: tshig 'khrul pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-5: tshig gzung bar 'os pas ngag mnyan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-6: shes rab thob pas lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-7: mi rnams kyi nang du kha na ma thob med par 'gyur ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-9: brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-11: mis bsngags pa'i chos brgyad po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-12: brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-13: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-15: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-16: mi phyed pa lnga thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-19: gzhan gyi gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'da' bas lus mi phyed pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-20: gzhan dag ga la chags pa med pas g-yog mi phyed pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-21: las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas dad pa mi phyed pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-22: sgrub pa snying por byed pas chos las mi phyed pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-23: mi slu bas mdza' bo mi phyed pa thob pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-25: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307a-26: mi phyed pa lnga po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-0: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba @307b de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-1: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des g-yog mi phyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-3: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor dbye bar mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-5: tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-6: ngag gi las yongs su dag pa brgyad thob bo; ;brgyad gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-14: skye bo mang po dga' ba'i tshig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-15: ma smad pa'i tshig yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-17: tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-18: ngag gi las yongs su dag pa brgyad po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-19: tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-20: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-22: tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-23: gcig tu nges pa gsum thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-26: tshig ran pas mkhas pa rnams gcig tu nges par dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-27: lan legs par lon pas gcig tu nges par de'i blo bden pa la 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:307b-28: bcos ma ma yin par mdza' bas gcig tu nges par lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-0: @308a *// mi'i che ba nyid thob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-2: tshig kyal ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-3: gcig tu nges pa gsum po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-4: tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-5: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyad par lung ston cing gzhan du mi gsung ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-7: brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-11: dbang po ma tshad pa med pas lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-13: sems la dbang pa thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-14: dgra thams cad kyis mi rdzibs longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-15: dbang phyug la dbang ba rgya chen po slob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-16: bsod nams kyi dbang gis de'i sems longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-17: yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po thams cad la 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-18: dgab pa mchog thob pas rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-20: sngon phrag dog med pas longs spyod ji ltar smon pa rnams de las stong phrag brgya 'gyur du khyad par du 'gyur ba thob pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-22: brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-23: dbang po lnga po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308a-24: brnab sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-0: de dge ba'i rtsa @308b ba des 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gcig por 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-2: gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-3: yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-6: de'i sems rnam par mi 'tshe ba la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-7: de'i sems gnod sems rab tu zhi ba la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-8: de'i sems rtsod pa med cing 'thab pa med pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-9: de'i sems drang zhing ma nyen la nges pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-10: 'phags pa'i skye bor grags par 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-11: sems can thams cad la bde bar dga' zhing byams pa'i sems pan pa'i dngos po mang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-12: bde ba la mngon par dga' zhing dang ba mang la skye bo mang pos bsti stang bya bar 'gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-13: sems snum zhing las su rung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob pa mi dkon par 'gyur ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-15: gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-16: yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad po de dag thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-17: gnod sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-18: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems thogs pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa blta bas mi ngoms par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-20: log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:308b-21: yon tan gyi chos bcu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-2: bsam pa dge bar 'gyur zhing grogs po dge ba rnyed par 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-3: las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-4: lhar sangs rgyas 'dzin gyi gzhan lhar mi 'dzin pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-5: ngo mtshar dang bkra shis dang bral bas lta ba drang ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-6: grogs lha dang mi yin gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-7: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa grogs su mi 'gyur ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-8: bsod nams sbyangs pas khyad par du 'gro ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-9: log pa thams cad med pas 'phags pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-10: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral zhing sdig pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-11: yang dag par song zhing yang dag par zhugs pas sgrib pa med par mthong ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-12: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du mi khom pa dang bral ba yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-14: log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-15: yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag thob po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-16: log par lta ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba des de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur te; mngon par shes pa myur pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309a-19: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i @309b phun sum tshogs pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-2: bzlog na mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-3: de dag shas cher bsten cing bsgoms te ma bdu byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-10: de la srog gcod pa bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-11: sems can dmyal bar khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-12: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-13: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-14: de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na'ang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-17: ma byin par len pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-18: sems can dmyal bar khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-19: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid ngo; ;gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-20: de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na'ang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-22: thun mong gi longs spyod du 'gyur ba'o; ;'dod pa la log par g-yem pas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-23: sems can dmyal bar khrid do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:309b-27: g-yog 'khor yid brtan du mi rung ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-13: tshig rtsub pos ni; sems can dmyal bar khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-14: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-15: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-17: yid du mi 'ong ba thos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-20: sems can dmyal bar khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-21: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-24: gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-25: ma nges pa'i spobs par 'gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310a-27: sems can dmyal bar khrid do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-9: gzhan gyis gnod pa bya bar 'gyur ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-11: sems can dmyal bar khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-12: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-13: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-14: de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na'ang rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-15: lta ba ngan par ltung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-19: mi dge ba bcu po 'di dag gis sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po tshad med pa yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-21: de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-23: longs spyod mi 'phrog pa dang tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang gzhan gyis gnod pa bya ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:310b-26: ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-0: longs spyod mi 'phrog pa dang dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su @311a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pas bla na med pa'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-4: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-6: longs spyod mi 'phrog pa dang chung ma mi g-yem par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-9: chung ma la su'ang sdang ba'i sems kyis lta bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-11: brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-13: longs spyod mi 'phrog pa dang skur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed de yi dam la brtan par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-17: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas spyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-19: longs spyod ma 'phrog pa dang g-yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang bsam pa mthun pas byang chub sems dpa'i g-yog 'khor thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311a-22: tshig rtsub bo spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-0: longs spyod mi @311b 'phrog pa dang gzung ba'i tshig tu 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang 'khor ma mgu bar su'ang mi 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-4: tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-8: yid ches pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang the tshom thams cad gcod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-11: brab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-14: longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po la de'i sems 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rgya chen po la mos shing dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-17: gnod sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-20: mdzes pa dang skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang thogs pa med pa'i blo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-22: thogs pa med pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-23: dbang po ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:311b-25: log par lta ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-0: sangs rgyas la dad cing yang dag par lta @312a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-4: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-5: byang chub sems bskyed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-7: de ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ngag sbyin pas brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-9: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid tshul khrims kyis brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don du smon pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-11: dge ba bcu'i las 'di dag nyid bzod pas brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-14: sangs rgyas kyi dbyings yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-15: de bzhin du sbyar te brtson 'grus kyis brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-16: bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-23: dga' ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-25: lta ba ngan pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-27: sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-29: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-31: zhum pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-34: khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312a-35: bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-0: sems can thams @312b cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-1: dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-6: yang dag par spong bas brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-7: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-8: dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-9: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-16: sems las su rung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-17: nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-19: rdzi ba med cing dbul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-20: nyes pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-21: byang chub kyi yan lag gis brgyan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-22: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-23: lam gyis brgyan na yang dag pa'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-25: nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-27: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i shes rab dag ye shes su 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-30: 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-33: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:312b-34: mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag thob pa yongs su rdzogs par @313a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-4: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rgya cher rnam par dbyebs brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-7: dper na; sa la gnas pa'i grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-12: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-17: las kyi mtha' thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-18: sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-20: lo tog thams cad skyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-21: rmo ba brko ba bya ba 'byung ba de dag gi gnas ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-24: de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-27: mi slob pa'i 'bras bu rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-29: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-31: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rten yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rten yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-34: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-35: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-39: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313a-40: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mchos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313b-0: @313b rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-058-003:313b-3: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
